title: About NEW DYNAMIC Game Loading Screen
body:
**I have found out this when I was review "Warriors. MV".  There is a "Dynamic Game Loading Screen" which is from 00:00:20 --- 00:00:23. I'm very curious is that will become true.    **

You guys can check it out through video that Draven{{champion:119}}  is swing his Axe {{item:3725}} . And same as Thresh {{champion:412}} , Lissandra {{champion:127}} ,Jinx {{champion:222}}  and Aatrox {{champion:266}} .

Does anyone knowing something about this?

replies.body:
It's a scientific term called, "We have the technology to implement this but we can't be stuffed." Kind of like the promise of a fully functioning replay system (early last year), a tribunal for OCE (never), or the smooth LolCAM (was reworked into spectator, and never touched again).

Broken promises.

Shallow dreams.
